Name: Add dA base to 3' ends of dsDNA
Output: ds DNA with single 3' A overhang

actions.remark: 1 mm datp stocks should be prepared using 100 mm datp from neb. store the 1 mm datp in 25-_l aliquots at -20_c. thaw stocks only once for use in the above described reaction, as datp is adversely affected by freeze-thaw cycles.

components.name: Buffer, Klenow (NEB buffer 2; New England Biolabs)
Enzyme Mix, Klenow fragment (3' to 5' exo-) (New England Biolabs)

actions.how: in a water bath or heat block

actions.remark:
follow the manufacturer's recommended protocol, but elute in a final volume of
10 _l of buffer eb. note that this kit uses different elution columns than the qiaquick pcr purification kit.
actions.protocol_kit name: Qiagen's QIAquick MinElute PCR Purification kit

components.name: Nucleic Acid, DNA, double-stranded, with single 3' A overhang

actions.protocol_output: Nucleic Acid, DNA, double-stranded, with single 3' A overhang

Remarks:
An overhanging adenine (A) base is added to the 3' end of the blunt DNA fragments by
the use of Klenow fragment. This aids the ligation of the Illumina adapters, which have
a single thymine (T) base overhang at their 3' ends.
